item.title: 'Agents of SHIELD' actress marries girlfriend
item.ExtractedText: Surprise! "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D." actress Saffron Burrows, left, is a newlywed. The 42-year-old revealed in an interview with The Guardian that she eloped with her longtime girlfriend, "Ellen DeGeneres Show" writer Alison Balian, in August. Loading weather data ...
